lead_paragraph: As a fire roared to the edge of Yarnell, Ariz., this week, painful memories resurfaced of the day in 2013 when 19 firefighters died in the same area.

headline.print_headline: Wildfire Awakens the Sorrow of an Arizona Town Still Scarred by Loss
headline.main: Wildfire Awakens the Sorrow of an Arizona Town Still Scarred by Loss

snippet: As a fire roared to the edge of Yarnell, Ariz., this week, painful memories resurfaced of the day in 2013 when 19 firefighters died in the same area.
abstract: Residents of Yarnell, Ariz, hearing news of wildfire in nearby mountains, are reminded of massive 2013 blaze that took lives of 19 firefighters; local authorities say they were able to stop current fire in its tracks, in part due to lessons learned three years earlier.
